description.originalText: I typically avoid leaving reviews and am cautious about trusting strangers with my dog. However, when I needed to find someone through care.com to care for my dog, Cooper, amidst a busy schedule, I decided to take a chance on Misha based on her highly recommended reviews—and I'm glad I did. From our initial meeting, Misha's professionalism and genuine compassion immediately put me at ease. Despite my initial reservations, Misha took the time to understand Cooper's routine and personality, ensuring he felt comfortable and loved in her care. Cooper is pretty picky and doesn't take a liking to just anyone. i was truly impressed by his judgement.  Her regular updates and photos throughout the day were not only reassuring but also a testament to her dedication. I'm grateful for Misha's outstanding service. She's more than just a dog walker; she's a true animal lover. I wholeheartedly recommend Misha to anyone seeking exceptional pet care. With cooper taking a liking to her seemingly warm spirit, I look forward to booking her again for possible Pet sitting, walking again and a doggy playdate with her pup summer! Thank you again, Misha. You have been awesome!

YOU NEED TO READ THIS BEFORE BOOKING WITH MISHA! I discovered Misha through care.com and I wanted to ensure I was making the right choice... I decided to arrange a play date for my dog with Misha and her dog, Summer, before committing to booking any services. It turned out to be the best decision I could have made.

Misha and Summer were delightful companions for my dog. Seeing how well-trained and gentle Summer was, even functioning as a service dog, reassured me of Misha's abilities and care. The play date allowed me to witness firsthand how attentive and responsible Misha is with both her own dog and mine.

When I eventually had to leave town for a week, Misha continued to impress. She sent regular updates and photos, letting me know how my dog was doing and providing peace of mind. I was so glad I gave Misha a chance—she exceeded my expectations in every way. I have to consistently do long travels for work and she is the only person I let walk my dog.  highly recommend Misha to anyone seeking reliable and compassionate pet care.

Misha is an outstanding dog walker who truly goes the extra mile for her furry clients. Recently, when my dog, Rocky, was recovering from a minor injury, Misha demonstrated exceptional care by adjusting his walks to accommodate his limited mobility. She took the time to ensure he got gentle exercise and plenty of attention without aggravating his injury. Misha's professionalism and dedication were evident in how she handled the situation with care and compassion. Her knowledge of canine behavior and health meant Rocky received the right level of activity and rest needed for a speedy recovery. Misha's thoughtful approach and genuine love for animals make her my top choice for pet care. I highly recommend her services to anyone looking for a reliable and caring dog walker!
